sense.def:
To sanctify something
pomeni, da Cerkev ali visok cerkven uradnik nekaj blagoslovi ali odobri.

seg.quote: St Francis wanted to sanctify poverty, not to abolish it.

sense.def:
To sanctify an idea, practice, or situation
pomeni odobriti, zagovarjati in braniti pred spremembami zamisel, način delovanja ali okoliščine.

seg.quote: ...to protect and sanctify the power that was so ruthlessly being used.
